column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''9''' is the ninth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "A Linguistic Review of  The Treason of Isengard" — [[Jorge Quiñónez]].
* "Notes Toward a Translation of 'Lúthien's Song'" — [[Patrick H. Wynne]].

* "Transitions in Translations"<ref>Contents of the column: Danish Appendectomies ; About Translation of the ''LoTR'' into French (by [[Nathalie Kotowski]]) ; Trivia Question (Plus!)</ref> (column) — edited by [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
